## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Interfacing with google drive

Initial setup

```{r setup}

# devtools::install_github("ekothe/trackdown")
library(googledrive, trackdown)
googledrive::drive_auth()

```

Code to send to the google drive

```{r upload to google drive}

trackdown::upload_rmd(
  # leave out file extension (i.e., no ".Rmd" at the end)
  file = "gap_sourcevan", 
  gfile = "gap_sourcevan_g"
)
```

Code to to retrieve revisions from google drive

```{r download from google drive}
# 
trackdown::download_rmd(
    # leave out file extension (i.e., no ".Rmd" at the end)
                  file = "gap_sourcevan", 
                  gfile = "gap_sourcevan_g"
                  ) 

```
